```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# If you have new_session=yes in your _bookdown.yml file,
# then you need to copy this block to each Rmd file.
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(widgetframe_self_contained = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(widgetframe_widgetsdir = 'widgets')
```

# Preface {-}

Just a demo book to show how `widgetframe` package can be used along with `bookdown` for embedding widgets correctly (without having their CSS rules messed up) in gitbooks.
